intro: Urostachys reflexus var. polycarpus, commonly known as the clustered filifolium, is a rare and delicate plant native to the mountainous regions of China. It belongs to the Polygonaceae family, characterized by its succulent leaves and flowering stems. The plant features dense clusters of small, greenish-white flowers that bloom in late summer. Its leaves are narrow, lance-shaped, and often covered in a fine layer of hair. Due to its limited distribution and habitat specificity, it is considered a botanically significant and ecologically sensitive species.
